name: 蕭郁達
objective:
本課程說明程序最適化的基本原理，介紹化工程序及能源系統中常見的最適化策略。內容包括：最適化理論及演算法、數學規劃與建模技巧、最適化於化工問題及能源議題之應用。
This course aims to introduce optimisation basics and common optimisation strategies in chemical processes and energy systems. The contents include optimisation theory and algorithms, mathematical programming and modelling techniques, and applications to chemical engineering problems and energy issues.
schedule:
Week 1 – Introduction to Process Optimization
Week 2 – Linear and Nonlinear Programming
Week 3 – Mixed-Integer Programming
Week 4 – Disjunctive Programming
Week 5 – Global Optimization
Week 6 – Stochastic Optimization
Week 7 – Flexibility Analysis
Week 8-9 – Optimization of Heat Exchanger Networks
Week 10-11 – Optimization of Water Networks
Week 12-13 – Optimization of Hydrogen Networks
Week 14-15 – Optimization of Supply Chains
Week 16-18 – Flexibility Analysis for Process Operability
scorePolicy:
Participation 30%
Assignments and Quiz 35%
Final Report 35%
materials:
1. Grossmann, I. E., "Advanced Optimization for Process Systems Engineering". Cambridge University Press, 2021.
2. Self-made materials
